name: CL_QFORM1
description: The CL_QFORM1 table is the second master table for questionnaire forms. It is used along with CL_QFORM.

columns.name: FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the form record.

columns.name: FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.
